name: Chef Mao
description:
After playing a Food Event Card: Create 1 random Basic Elemental Die (once per Round).
After playing a Food Event Card:Draw 1 random Food Event Card from your deck (once per match).

descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card:</color> Create 1 random Basic Elemental Die (once per Round).\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card:</color>Draw 1 random {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card from your deck (once per match).
storytext: "We just concern ourselves with making the most delicious food imaginable using everyday ingredients, universally loved flavors, and truly excellent cooking."
source: Reward for accepting Chef Mao's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
